name: BattleBall
description:
Arrange a ball-duel with your friend on single screen or fight alone (coming soon).

Features:

• Smash your opponent!

• Gain speed and crash the enemy to inflict damage!

•Keep track of your character!

• Use your reflexes to dodge the enemy!

• Get boosts and use them in battle!

• Choose a map and smash conditions!

• Defeat powerful and challenging bosses! (soon)

• Unlock upgrades and new battlefields! (soon)

• Unlock skins to customize your avatar! (soon)


Please note this is an alpha version of the game. We'll improve it and make it more interesting for you! If you find a bug or you have an offer, write us a mail, please!
